name: overzealousness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being too enthusiastic or too eager: There was a pattern of overzealousness on the part of the authorities. We have to guard against over-zealousness. Related word
overzealousCompare
zealousness
More examplesFewer examplesThe closure of the society seemed like an act of overzealousness on the part of a single official.A spokesperson for the organization said that the new requirements were a sign of government overzealousness after the attack.A teacher from the school said that he was concerned about the over-zealousness of the police and the judiciary.The two sides accused each other of over-zealousness.
